channel.title: Have a question with PortForwarding, please read and help me
channel.description: Guys, i believe i cannot do the PortForwarding thing becuase i dont have a router, i use a Modem, i use my phone line to get Internet, so, can i still do the PortForwarding, or i just cant make my server?

item.title: Have a question with PortForwarding, please read and help me
item.dc:creator: @iatchi1019 iatchi1019
item.description:
@iatchi1019 wrote:

acctualy that isnt true. i dont have a router but i have a normal server

Read full topic

item.title: Have a question with PortForwarding, please read and help me
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Without a router, you can not make a regular private server. Your only choice now is Hamachi. Hamachi is a program that you can download at your own risk. A tutorial on making a Hamachi server can be found here.

Read full topic
item.source: Have a question with PortForwarding, please read and help me

item.title: Have a question with PortForwarding, please read and help me
item.dc:creator: @The_General The General
item.description:
@The_General wrote:

No, sadly. You need a router port in order to PortForward. If Iâ€™m wrong, please tell me, but this is what I am 90% certain of.

Read full topic
